channel.title: 1ST PROBLEM SOLVED!2nd prob: Arrows dont decrease when I range
channel.description:
When I fire arrows, the arrows dont decrease by one, so lets say u have 20 arrows and u shoot 5. I still have 20, while im supposed to have 15.
How would I fix these problems? Please help!
EDIT: And thanks to all that helped me with the exp thing, I finally hit a 1 lol.

item.title: 1ST PROBLEM SOLVED!2nd prob: Arrows dont decrease when I range
item.dc:creator: @_Vengeance _Vengeance
item.description:
@_Vengeance wrote:

Just decrement the amount of items in the arrows slot upon firing one…

Read full topic
item.source: 1ST PROBLEM SOLVED!2nd prob: Arrows dont decrease when I range

item.title: 1ST PROBLEM SOLVED!2nd prob: Arrows dont decrease when I range

item.source: 1ST PROBLEM SOLVED!2nd prob: Arrows dont decrease when I range

item.title: 1ST PROBLEM SOLVED!2nd prob: Arrows dont decrease when I range
item.dc:creator: @LeechYourStuffPlease LeechYourStuffPlease
item.description:
@LeechYourStuffPlease wrote:

Lol, It was a good Idea. XD If you have anymore Problems I will be glad to help.[quote=“pk3r john, post:6, topic:232858”][quote author=LeechYourStuffPlease link=topic=307105.msg2455799#msg2455799 date=1222216791]
Take the exp you get by hitting a 3. And Divide it by 3.
Problem Solved.
And Finally Someone does not multipost on the forums!
Actually puts they have another question.
Pats On Back.
To bad I cannot Rep yet
[/quote]

Thanks! 1st problem solved :P[/quote]

Read full topic
